mysql.name: del_t_raffle_result
mysql.sql: delete f.* from t_raffle_result f where f.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s' and f.ACTIVITIES_ID = '%(activitiesId)s';

mysql.name: del_t_raffle_result_address
mysql.sql: delete t.* from t_raffle_result_address t where EXISTS(select 1 from t_raffle_result f where t.RESULT_ID = f.ID and f.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s' and f.ACTIVITIES_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' );
mysql.desc: 删除中奖结果表地址表

mysql.name: t_sku_1
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 1 where EXISTS(select 1 from t_raffle_prize p where p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.sku_id = k.ID);
mysql.desc: 修改非即开奖品库存为1

mysql.name: t_sku_0
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 0 where EXISTS(select 1 from t_raffle_prize p where p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.sku_id = k.ID);
mysql.desc: 修改非即开奖品库存为0

mysql.name: t_sku_21
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 0 where EXISTS(select 1 from t_raffle_prize p where p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.sku_id = k.ID);
mysql.desc: 修改非即开奖品库存为21个

mysql.name: t_sku_total_inventory
mysql.sql: select k.TOTAL_INVENTORY from t_sku k where EXISTS(select 1 from t_raffle_prize p where p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.sku_id = k.ID);

mysql.name: t_points_1
mysql.sql: update t_points s set s.TOTAL_POINTS = 1 where s.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s';

mysql.name: t_points_99999999
mysql.sql: update t_points s set s.TOTAL_POINTS = 99999999 where s.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s';

mysql.name: del_t_order_detail
mysql.sql: DELETE d.* from t_order_detail d where EXISTS(select * from t_raffle_result t where d.RAFFLE_RESULT_ID = t.id and t.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s' and t.ACTIVITIES_ID ='%(activitiesId)s');

mysql.name: del_t_order
mysql.sql: DELETE o.* from t_order o where EXISTS(select 1 from t_order_detail d , t_raffle_result t where o.id = d.ORDER_ID and d.RAFFLE_RESULT_ID = t.id and t.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s' and t.ACTIVITIES_ID = '%(activitiesId)s');

mysql.name: update_t_sku_02_TOTAL_INVENTORY_1
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 1 where EXISTS(select p.SKU_ID from t_raffle_prize p ,t_item i where p.SKU_ID = k.id and p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.ITEM_ID = i.id and i.DELIVER_TYPE = '02');
mysql.desc: 修改大转盘活动通知类奖品库存为1

mysql.name: update_t_sku_02_TOTAL_INVENTORY_0
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 0 where EXISTS(select p.SKU_ID from t_raffle_prize p ,t_item i where p.SKU_ID = k.id and p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.ITEM_ID = i.id and i.DELIVER_TYPE = '02');
mysql.desc: 修改大转盘活动通知类奖品库存为0

mysql.name: update_t_sku_01_TOTAL_INVENTORY_0
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 0 where EXISTS(select p.SKU_ID from t_raffle_prize p ,t_item i where p.SKU_ID = k.id and p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.ITEM_ID = i.id and i.DELIVER_TYPE = '01');
mysql.desc: 修改大转盘活动实物类奖品库存为0

mysql.name: update_t_sku_00_TOTAL_INVENTORY_0
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 0 where EXISTS(select p.SKU_ID from t_raffle_prize p ,t_item i where p.SKU_ID = k.id and p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.ITEM_ID = i.id and i.DELIVER_TYPE = '00');
mysql.desc: 修改大转盘活动电子类奖品库存为0

mysql.name: update_t_sku_02_TOTAL_INVENTORY_50
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 50 where EXISTS(select p.SKU_ID from t_raffle_prize p ,t_item i where p.SKU_ID = k.id and p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.ITEM_ID = i.id and i.DELIVER_TYPE = '02');
mysql.desc: 修改大转盘活动通知类奖品库存为50

mysql.name: update_t_sku_01_TOTAL_INVENTORY_50
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 50 where EXISTS(select p.SKU_ID from t_raffle_prize p ,t_item i where p.SKU_ID = k.id and p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.ITEM_ID = i.id and i.DELIVER_TYPE = '01');
mysql.desc: 修改大转盘活动实物类奖品库存为50

mysql.name: update_t_sku_00_TOTAL_INVENTORY_50
mysql.sql: update t_sku k set k.TOTAL_INVENTORY = 50 where EXISTS(select p.SKU_ID from t_raffle_prize p ,t_item i where p.SKU_ID = k.id and p.RAFFLE_ID = '%(activitiesId)s' and p.ITEM_ID = i.id and i.DELIVER_TYPE = '00');
mysql.desc: 修改大转盘活动电子类奖品库存为50
